record.field: Send SaaS credentials to the buyer of the SaaS

Welcome to ${user.company_id.name}
YOUR ACCOUNT CREDENTIALS

Dear ${object.name},

Below is your Account Credentials
${object.public_url}
${user.signature | safe}

Sent by ${user.company_id.name}
Send information about expiration date update to partner

Welcome to ${user.company_id.name}
YOUR ACCOUNT CREDENTIALS

Dear ${object.name},

You Account expiration date is now: ${object.expiration_datetime}

${format_tz(object.expiration_datetime, tz=object.partner_id.tz, context={'lang':object.partner_id.lang})}
${user.signature | safe}

Sent by ${user.company_id.name}

Welcome to ${user.company_id.name}
YOUR ACCOUNT ONCOMING EXPIRATION

Dear ${object.name},

Less than ${ctx["days"]} day(s) left before expiration.

${user.signature | safe}

Sent by ${user.company_id.name}

Welcome to ${user.company_id.name}
YOUR ACCOUNT ONCOMING EXPIRATION

Dear ${object.name},

% if object.trial: Your trial service ${object.name} has expired % endif % if object.block_on_expiration: and blocked! % else: you have to pay in order to continue using the service! % endif

${user.signature | safe}

Sent by ${user.company_id.name}

Welcome to ${user.company_id.name}
YOUR ACCOUNT STORAGE EXCEEDED

Dear ${object.name},

Storage limit ${object.total_storage_limit} of ${object.name} has been exceeded. Contact your system administrator in order to resume using your service.

${user.signature | safe}

Sent by ${user.company_id.name}
